alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:20PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Millard...northeastern Juab...southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles west of Nephi, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Little Sahara State Park, Tintic Junction and Jericho. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 112 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
